34901169.review:
Cat Quest is a simple but competently made, fun and charmingly designed Action RPG.

The visual design is very cute and in some ways rather clever. There are only the overworld, that looks like you are constantly traversing a big map, and simple dungeonmaps you go in fight everything and the leave again. 

Some of the fun lies therein how the game plays with this aspect and uses it in humorous ways to lead the player around and from battle to battle, putting down lines and x and other symbols on it like it was drawn unto the world.

The Gameplay is VERY simple, quests are super linear and the fun in following them comes mainly from how the game presents the little scenarios and stories in. 

The combat is quick and easy to understand, so easy in fact i wont go into details because after fighting just one enemy most people will have understood everything there is. HOWEVER that doesn't means the game can be beat by button mashing, not at all. Players who just mindlessly button mash and not pay attention to the warnings for incoming attacks will find themselves frequently and repeatedly dying.

The Equipment system is actually a bit broken. You find equipment in form of hats/helmets, armor and weapons and if you have a specific item again said item will be upgraded. There are chests to find in the world but you can only find and loot them once. After that you need to rely on the smith. In the smithy the player can choose to purchase a small chest for 50 Gold or a big chest for 5000 gold. The Items out of that are randomly chosen and then upgrade their respective gear in your inventory. 
This sadly leads to some of the items being flat out useless although they might look better since you have a chance that they never are going to be better then the ones you got a the beginning and that you leveled up big time until then.
Never has a game more needed a fashion slot more so that the players can equip the look they want while getting the stats from something better.

The magic system is okay, nothing special but also usefull enougzh so that you constantly use it.

Now, to be truthfull, the game is actually really repetetive when it comes to its gameplay.
You pick up a quest, you follow the marker, kill a bunch of enemys and then follwo the next marker. That is all there is to it.

That i still recommend it comes from the fun stories presented in the quests and main line and the light humor of its design overal.as well from the fact that it is rather short. 

After 13 hours i played trough the main quest, all sidequests and several quests you need to discover trough exploration.
There are a few highlevel tasks still over as well as some REALLY Highlevel Dungeons that i feel are only there if your REALLY want to grind more in this combat.

The game wont blow your mind.
But Cat Quest doesn't outstay its wellcome and until its end is well made, well presented and fun to play.

34844307.review:
[h1]Información[/h1]
[b]Nombre:[/b] Cat Quest
[b]Género:[/b] Action RPG - Indie
[b]Desarrollador:[/b] The Gentlebros
[b]Editor:[/b] PQube Limited
[b]Fecha de Lanzamiento:[/b] 8 de Agosto de 2017
[b]Plataforma:[/b] Steam 
[b]Precio Base:[/b] $12.99 USD - $139.99 MXN

Cat Quest es un increíble y bello juego ARPG (Action RPG) desarrollado por The Gentlebros (creadores de Slashy Hero) ambientado en un mundo de felinos. Debemos de rescatar a nuestra hermana de las garras de Drakoth, como el único Sangredragon que queda con vida, realizando misiones secundarias, explorando mazmorras y consiguiendo mejores equipo para volvernos más fuerte.

Cuenta con un sistema de combate bastante simple, tenemos los ataques cuerpo a cuerpo de 3 golpes asignados a un botón y podemos asignar hasta 4 botones para utilizar magia que cuenta con una variedad de hasta 7 tipos de magias diferentes. Podemos desbloquear 2 habilidades para explorar Felinia, la habilidad de caminar sobre el agua y la habilidad para volar, ésta última aumenta bastante nuestra velocidad de movimiento lo cual la hace perfecta para explorar el mundo más rápidamente y completar lo que nos haga falta.

Tenemos bastantes misiones secundarias disponibles en los tablones de las ciudades que será nuestra fuente principal de Oro y Experiencia a lo largo de nuestra aventura por Felinia.

Al subir de nivel, obtenemos una mejora de nuestras estadísticas de vida, daño cuerpo a cuerpo y daño con magia, obteniendo mayor mejora de vida que las otras estadísticas. Así mismo, existe una estadística denominada armadura, ésta solo se consigue aumentar con equipo. La Armadura se regenera automáticamente después de un tiempo a diferencia de la vida que debemos ir a tomar una siesta para recuperarla.

También contamos con una gran cantidad de equipo que podremos obtener de misiones principales y secundarias, pero la mayoría lo obtendremos de los cofres que se encuentran en las mazmorras. Hay 2 tipos de cofres, los normales y los dorados sólo que para abrir éstos últimos necesitaremos encontrar una llave.

Normalmente los cofres nos darán objetos aleatorios salvo algunos pocos cofres que tienen objetos fijos (es decir, siempre nos dará ese objeto en la partida). Por la naturaleza de los cofres, nos pueden tocar equipo repetido pero no te preocupes porque al obtener un equipo que ya habíamos obtenido antes, dicho equipo subirá de nivel hasta un nivel máximo de 99 mejorando las estadísticas del objeto.

Tiene un estilo visual adorable y una banda sonora bastante buena que se nota una clara inspiración en clásicos del género. El juego está repleto de bromas de gatos y referencias a otros juegos (Tomb Raider, Slashy Hero) e incluso series de la televisión (Juego de Tronos) que te sacarán una sonrisa mientras juegas.

[h1]Opinión Final[/h1]
Cat Quest es un juego ARPG excelente que nos trajo The Gentlebros, muchas misiones, equipo que coleccionar, bromas de gatos y una banda sonora agradable que en conjunto crean la receta perfecta de lo que es un juego divertido y ameno. Lo recomiendo a cualquier persona ya que es uno de los mejores indies que ha salido en este 2017.

[h1]Aspectos Positivos y Negativos[/h1]
+ Sistema de combate simple pero más que suficiente.
+ Bromas y referencias que te sacaran una sonrisa.
+ Montones de misiones que cumplir y equipo que coleccionar.
+ Más de 50 mazmorras que completar.
+ Estupendo arte visual y banda sonora.
+ Variedad de enemigos (incluso hay un enemigo secreto poderoso en los mares).
- Obtener todo el equipo se basa en la suerte que tengas al abrir cofres.
- No hay mucha variedad de misiones ya que sólo son de matar enemigos o completar mazmorras

[code]Si te agradó/disgustó mi análisis apreciaría bastante que lo valores con los botones de abajo.[/code]

34774821.review:
可愛い猫のキャラクターとヌルヌル動くグラフィックに
一目惚れして購入してみました。
実績全解除までに8時間少々かかりましたが
クリアするだけなら3時間もかからないと思います。

他のレビューなどで報告が一切無いようですが
何故か私の環境ではコントローラー(DS4)が認識せず
Steamのコントローラーバインドでプレイしました。
設定を決めるまでは時間がかかりましたが
プレイ自体は快適に出来るようになりました。
コントローラー設定をアップしたので同じ症状になった方は
使ってみて下さい。


ゲームの感想としては「とても良いんだけど物足りない」
と言った感じです。
2段階評価ですのでギリギリ高評価でも良かったのですが
思っていた以上に肩透かしを食らった部分が多かったので低評価で。

まず前述したように、普通にクリアするだけなら
3時間程度で終わってしまうボリュームですが
サブクエストを全部埋めていこうとするとかなりの時間を要します。
これはサブクエストが非常に充実しているという意味ではなく
「中身の無いお使いにひたすらあちこち出かけさせられる」
と言う内容のクエストが大半を占めているからです。
クエスト報酬も経験値とさほど魅力的でもない武器が貰えるだけで
新アクションや新スキルと言った開放要素がサブクエストには
存在しないため、レベリング以外の存在価値が一切ありません。
メインクエストの進行状況にほぼ関係なく受注可能ですので
高難易度のサブクエストがどんどん受注でき、
レベルと装備だけが充実していってしまうのでメインクエストが
ヌルゲーの作業ゲーと化してしまいます。
「サブクエ全部埋めてからじゃないとメインクエ進めたくない」
と言うコンプリート癖のある人は注意が必要です。

また戦闘に関してもバランスがあまり良いとは言えません。
特に敵の種類が非常に少ないのがかなりのマイナスポイントです。
固有グラフィックを持つボスがラスボスくらいしか存在せず
同じグラフィックでも出現場所によって攻撃力と体力が高いだけで
攻撃パターンが全く同じ敵を全編に渡って使い回しているので
序盤から終盤にかけてプレイ内容がほとんど変わりません。
また、こちら側の行動は序盤から終盤まで「燃やして殴って回る」
だけなのであまりテクニカルな戦闘にもなりません。
敵の攻撃範囲が分かりやすくしてある事とも踏まえて
敵ごとの攻略パターンをきちんと抑えて戦う事が出来ると言う
カジュアルなゲーム性を目指している事は伝わってきますが
それなりの難易度のアクションゲームをプレイするゲーマーには
不満が出るバランスだと思いました。

また、アイテムコンプリートの実績が運頼みなのも面倒ですし
ローカライズがエキサイトな翻訳なので
シナリオが一切頭に入ってこないのもRPGとしては問題ですね。


最終的な感想としては
とにかく"作業を延々させられたゲーム"と言う感じですね。
なんだかんだ言って暇つぶしにはなりましたが
オススメしたいと言うほどのものではありませんでした。
ただしグラフィックは本当に綺麗でそこは驚かされました。
次はこのグラフィックのクオリティで素晴らしいゲームが
このメーカーから生まれて欲しいと思います。

34764325.review:
Ver.1.0.144

[h1]内容[/h1]
　軽快な操作が良いシンプルでカジュアルなアクションRPGです。
　私の場合クリアまで8時間(Lv63)ほどでしたが、スムーズに進められる方なら5時間あればクリア可能な容量かと思われます。
　なお「膨大なサイドクエスト」と銘打たれていますが、62個の同じような"お使い"を膨大と言うのかどうか…。

[h1]日本語訳[/h1]
　日本語対応されていますが、例によって奇怪な日本語のため（単純な機械翻訳ではなさそう）そこは期待しない方がよいです。ガイドがある親切設計な為、一切分からなくても問題なく進められますが、逆に言えばストーリーを期待して買うゲームではないということです。

[h1]操作[/h1]
　非常に軽快で、複雑な操作は一切ないです。この手のゲームの基本であるヒットアンドアウェイさえ心がけていれば難なくクリアできる難易度です。ありがちなパズル要素は一切ないです。

[h1]価格[/h1]
　妥当なところだと思います。丁寧に作られているので損は感じない価格帯だと思います。

[h1]実績について[/h1] (2017/09/09追記)
　全実績解除したのでこれについて。
　「ファッショニスタライオン」(全装備収集)以外はすんなり埋まるかと思われます。
　ちなみに私の環境下では従者の斧(Squire Axe)のみダンジョンから入手できなかったので、少々面倒でしたが50Gの鍛冶屋のランダム宝箱を根気よく引いて実績解除しました。なお解除について詳しいガイドがありますのでそちらを参考になさると良いと思います。

[h1]総評[/h1]
　特に欠点はない良作という感じを受けました。是非にとは言いませんが、カジュアルめなゲームをお求めの方はプレイしてみても良いかと思われます。

34753016.review:
Man läuft mit seinem Helden in einer flachen Welt herum, die gleichzeitig auch die Karte ist, um Monster zu bekämpfen, Quests zu erledigen und am Ende seine Schwester zu retten. Das wars, mehr hat das Spiel nicht, braucht es aber auch nicht. Dass was das Spiel macht, macht so richtig und gut.

+ Das Kampfsystem ist leicht, aber auch nicht unterfordernd
+ Der Grafikstil ist richtig nett und putzig 
+ Es gibt viele verschiedene Rüstungen, Waffen und Zauber
+ Das Spiel kann sowohl leicht, als auch schwer sein (je nach der eigenen Spielweise)

Wenn man dem Spiel zwei Sachen unbedingt vorwerfen will, dann...

- Das Spiel bleibt die ganze Zeit sehr oberflächlich. Keine Skilltree, kein Characterdesign, nicht unbedingt die fesselndste Story
- Es ist sehr kurz. Wenn man wie ich 100% das Spiel durchspielt, dann ist man trotzdem nach weniger als 10 Stunden durch.

[u]Fazit:[/u]

Wer hier ein tiefgründiges Action-RPG erwartet ist hier falsch. Für alle Anderen, die für wenig Geld ein kurzes aber sehr, sehr gutes Spiel suchen ist das eine [b]absolute Kaufempfehlung![/b]

34687645.review:
英雄でも勇者でもなく
素晴らしいネコが冒険をするアクションRPG。
日本語はデフォルトでありますが
台詞回しは胡散臭めです。
しかし完全な機械翻訳という感じはせず、
日本語は不慣れだけど努力している印象を抱きました。


[h1][b]世界観[/b][/h1]
素晴らしいネコの妹が掠われたので
助けに行きます。
道中で困っている田舎猫を助けたり、
素晴らしくないネコを懲らしめ
数々の困難に立ち向かい成長していきます。

[h1][b]システム[/b][/h1]
LVアップの他に宝箱から[b]武器・盾・鎧[/b]が
ランダムでドロップするので
それらを集めて成長をしていきます。
同じ装備が被ると装備LVが上昇して能力値が増加します。

アクション性は
[b]・基本攻撃
・緊急回避
・魔法を7種類の中から四つセット[/b]

シンプルですが、敵の火力は高く
ボタン連打では押し負ける事がしばしば。
緊急回避を駆使する必要があります。


[h1][b]プレイ中に感じた個人的な不満点[/b][/h1]

[b]・細かいバグ[/b]
現状では小さいバグをチラホラ見かけます。
時間が経てば解消されるかもしれません。

[b]・上位装備[/b]
上位の装備が出現する金の宝箱の値段が
異様に高く中々活かせる機会がありませんでした。
あと何がとはいいませんが
ある装備品に不満を感じました。


[h1][b]総評[/b][/h1]
低予算ゲームとしては綺麗にまとまっており、
一つの作品としての完成度は高いと思います。
素晴らしいネコで冒険をしたい人や
カジュアルなハクスラアクションをプレイしたい人は
購入を検討しても良いと思います。

34672369.review:
A surprisingly fun little game. Don't be put off by the generic name and cute asthetic, at first I thought this was going to be some cheap cash grabber but it actually has some polish and feels very well made. Controls feel tight, combat, though it is simplistic, it still feels satisfying. Gear leveling system is cool, though I could do without the box randomization system. And Though the cat puns can be reaching at times, the writing is actually well done and interesting, even the sidequests are interesting and kept me engaged as to what is happening. The game is also good at rewarding you for exploration, with a gear box found in nearly every dungeon,  and even though the game is short(around 5hrs), this gives you lots of things to explore and do afterwards.

34569954.review:
The meowment Cat Quest loaded, I was pawsitive I was in for a grrreat time.

Okay, got that out of my system we can move along now. If there is anything that the internet doesn’t get bored of it’s cats. I can’t exactly explain it, but an obsession that goes back to Egyptian times can’t necessarily be overrated. Cats invading video games isn’t exactly new either, with games such as Cat Goes Fishing, Catlateral Damage, Fort Meow and many more. Maybe I have been fortunate, but I have enjoyed them all and never been left with a fishy taste in my mouth. When I heard about Cat Quest, an open world RPG, I knew I had to check it out.

Needless to say guys, its pretty pawsome.(I swear that’s the last one.)

Right off the bat, I do recommend Cat Quest. Not just because its adorable and over the top, akin to something like Slime Rancher. I recommend it because I genuinely had a blast and couldn’t stop playing the game until it was all over. If Cat Quest accomplishes anything, it is that it is super simple and fun to play. This game is going to attract a wide age group and its got something for all of them.

As soon as you start the game and get past some story tidbits, the first thing I noticed was this huge vivid over-world map. Felingard is the name of this huge continent and you will explore all of it. This map isn’t just a means of getting from place to place. This map is the game. Monsters, towns, and events play out on this screen or one of the fifty two dungeons. You begin your epic quest to defeat a mysterious figure named Drakosh and his dragons.

The combat itself is all real time from an isometric view. The beautiful part is that the combat is super simple but manages to stay complex enough to keep you on your toes. You can slash with your equipped weapon, dodge roll, or cast one of the many spells in the game. This is one game I highly recommend you play with a controller. The enemies telegraph their attacks with either a red circle or symbol to represent a spell they are about to cast. Some enemies are faster than others and using different spells/tactics to overcome them is required.

The problem I found with Cat Quest’s combat is that it tends to have extremes. The combat is either far too easy or you’re going to die very fast. It never quite hits that sweet spot in the middle. Cat Quest does however have a good pace as the dungeons themselves range from level 1 to 99. If you find it to be too easy then just hop into a dungeon five or six levels higher than you and feel the pain. The dungeons themselves are rather simplistic in design and more about combat and loot.

Loot in this game I felt a bit divided on. Cat Quest has a stat system with the usual suspects, e.g. health, magic, damage, armor. You can mix and match armor pieces to create your own play style. If you don’t like physical attacks, then wear magic armor. Some armors even go to extremes giving huge benefits to one stat and taking away from others. Also some armors just suck in general, guess they are there to keep the game challenging maybe? The problem lies in Golden Chests.

Sometime in the middle of the game you will get access to these beauties. Golden chests contain rare loot. These rare items can break the game quite easily. I stumbled upon an item called Courage that gave me vast amounts of health. This item made bosses seem like they were tickling me and I just stood there whacking away at them. Now I could’ve not used that item, true, but I didn’t know any better. Plus if it’s in the game, why not use it? Cat Quest respects your time as a player and for that I appreciate it. However, the game’s combat just loses some of its enjoyment once you gain access to these golden chests. It’s like the game gave up and handed me the win.

That isn’t to say I didn’t love the combat in Cat Quest, I just wanted the last boss to actually be a challenge instead of dead in five seconds. I think the combat system had great potential to keep things fresh and fun all the way until the end. Cat Quest didn’t need to hand me the keys to the kingdom, proverbially.
Side quests and story galore.

One of the main highlights of Cat Quest is by far is its dialogue/story. Side quests are filled to the brim with cat puns, and hilarity. There are times where I found myself genuinely laughing and that isn’t an easy task for a game when it comes to me. On top of that, there is actually a pretty intense lore here that I found myself being wrapped up in as the game progressed. Drakoth’s story and the birth of the Dragonbloods is very interesting and far from what I expected.

The story isn’t one dimensional, despite appearing that way. The reason behind dragons tearing up the place is rather sad. When I finally reached the end of my “Cat Quest” I was left with far more questions than answers. Which also left me with a bit of a gripe. The end feels like it’s baiting for a sequel or DLC. While I don’t want to give any spoilers, Cat Quest comes to a climax with a threat looming, but the game just ends abruptly. It felt odd. Queen’s Bay an area that has one quest and no follow ups, more or less confirms this suspicion. Then again, more Cat Quest is hardly a bad thing.

In all, the side-quests were fun and enjoyable. They brought a life and personality to the world that left me wanting more. I can’t wait to see the Mice Pirates and the Lupus Empire. There was one side quest though that annoyed me to no end. One which had you traveling back and forth from opposite ends of the continent. Silly Chef cats.

Another obvious statement is that Cat Quest is very family friendly and pleasing to the eyes. This game is candy wrapped up in kittens. One fear I had was that the huge over world map would be one tone but Cat Quest does manage to keep things varied. You will venture on islands, snow caps, plagued lands and more. The art is very well done and mixes seamlessly with the combat and magic effects. 

The monsters, and sprites themselves are cute and I couldn’t help but chuckle when I put a big metal helmet on my cat. Item design is one area that I was also impressed with. It added plenty of personality on its own. An area that didn’t hit the mark for me was the menus. They were very bare-bones. Cat Quest is also available on mobile devices, and it shows in the menus especially.

The music and sound effects are as equally pleasing to the ears as the graphics are to the eyes. Every time I heard a meow when I got hit, it made me smile. There were times people nearby thought an actual cat was meowing, if that tells you anything. The music is as fun and adventurous as is required for this type of game. You can expect an orchestral soundtrack and if you keep moving in the game, no one track over stays its welcome.

I guess you could say I had a purrfect time.

Sorry I lied, I couldn’t help meowself.

I finished the game out at about nine hours and that was getting all the current Steam Achievements. Including all the outfits, and clearing all the dungeons. You’re looking at anywhere between six to ten hours total playtime. The game doesn’t have much in the way of replay. There is no new game+ and it’s basically a get done and go type of deal. Keep an eye out though for future DLC or an update. Aside from the achievements across all platforms, there are also Steam Cards. Obviously that’s computer only.

To wrap up, I found Cat Quest to be a highly enjoyable popcorn style game. You eat it, you love it, it’s bad for you chances are, but hey life is short and there is cats. It’s not going to rock the boat for innovation or expand your mind on new levels of philosophy. What it is going to do is give plenty of entertainment that you or your kid can enjoy together. I personally think it’s a good homage to the ARPG genre and worthy of your attention. Did I mention the cats?

Meow!

34541440.review:
I watched someone play a bit of Cat Quest and I thought to myself "would the novelty wear off and the cat-jokes fall flat after a while?". I decided to give it a try as a couch-relaxing game, and I loved it.

While the cat/purr/mew/paw jokes are repeated over and over again (maybe a bit too much, but as some say "so bad it's actually good") they actually help keeping the tone and atmosphere where it should be, never taking itself too seriously. It is a game, after all, and we already have plenty of "serious" games.

The gameplay felt fantastic and quite responsive, even though I played it from the couch with a steam controller while streaming the game off another PC. You can also tell the game is also pretty well crafted and balanced, with a touch of "dark souls" difficulty: the quest level is a mere indication, not a necessity, and while significantly harder nothing stops you from doing quests or engaging monsters 50-150 levels higher than you. For example I did one of the toughest side quests (level 99) around level 55-60. It proved VERY challenging, but significantly fun and engaging (and also rewarding, mind you).

While not an extremely long game, if you're just looking for something to play over a weekend, from the comfort of a couch, this game is terrific. The devs also hinted to possible future expansions, and given the fun I had with this game, I'll definitely look forward to it.

TL;DR: highly recommended.

34540648.review:
A simple solid hack-and-slash worth loosing a few hours in.

[list]
    [*] Good writing, visuals, and audio that all build an adorable and funny world.
    [*] Fairly simple fighting mechanics and leveling that manage to feel satisfying.
    [*] Not too challenging (so far). Could maybe add challenge by taking on quests well above your level.
    [*] The quests manage to feel unique in spite of their fairly simple goals. As far as I can tell, they're all pretty linear.
    [*] Acquiring items is mostly random. So there isn't much room for planning builds.
    [*] Items can't be sold. Instead, they level upon getting another of the same item.
    [*] Money appears to be useful only to upgrade spells and get random items at the smithy.
[/list]

Note: I've played this game for about 3.5hrs so far. I don't think I've quite hit the half-way mark yet. Although I've spent most of my time gobbling up all the side-quests I can find.

34517607.review:
Un RPG de gatos con armaduras, magia y espadas, una historia simple, pero bien contada, y un mapa pequeño pero colorido, muy detallado y agradable a la vista. 
La música ambiente de forma agradable y los enemigos tienen una curva de dificultad divertida, hay misiones secundarias, armaduras nuevas y habilidades a desbloquear. 

El juego me pareció muy divertido, me atrapó por varias horas y es evidente que solo el presupuesto impidió ambientarlo más profundamente, aun así, los desarrolladores lograron superar esas barreras económicas con ingenio, dandole un toque original y simpático a un juego de perfil bajito, pero bien contado, con buen ritmo, misiones y una cuota de misterio que no vienen nada mal.

En una era de refritos absurdos, triples aaa de precio ridículo, juegos recortados en dlc de pago, da gusto un juego que entretiene, relaja y viene al completo  a un precio justo. Si te gustan los gatos, tienes alma de niño y disfrutas de un RPG colorido y sin toques de la violencia excesiva que nos tiene acostumbrados la industria lo vas a pasar genial.

34516716.review:
First of all I would totaly recommend this game to anyone looking for a RPG to play in a very low stress way. I will split my review in two parts a more simple pros and cons part and another were I talk about each pro and con in depth.
-Pros-
-Nice Colorful Graphic Style
-Fluent Animations
-Somewhat Large Open World To Discover
-Lots of Items To collect
-Plenty Of Dungeons To Delve
-Many Side Quests
-Unique Cast of Monsters
-Well Thought Out Villian
-Weapon/Spell Progression
-Cat Puns
-Cons-
-World Seems Very Small End Game
-Very Little Post Final Boss Content
-Most items are useless
-Very Strait Forward Story
-Ending?
Now I will explain every pro and con in a bit more depth
-Pros-
-The Graphics in this game are very colorful and meld very well with the world. They seem to make every part of the world blend together in a painting, but the painting is a open world RPG.
-The Animations in this game are so nice. They are so fluent I am very happy that I didnt run into a single animation glich while playing through this game.
-The World the out feeling very large and as long as you are still discovering new areas to explore. Although that all changes when you unlock flight.
-Their all tons of items to collect. Some of which take special caves to find and collect, this includes facing a level 200 monster and wading through a pool of invisble traps). Also I thoughly enjoyed the chest opening consept of this game it not only helped level up and discover new gear, it also gave the game a little bit more depth to its currency system.
-Their are tons of dungeons in this game to delve into and defeat the lurking monsters. None of them feel even mildly close to the same either.
-Their are plenty of unique and fun side quests in this game to leveling you up, earn you some extra gear, or just to explore the open world. All the quests seemed very well thought out and well made. They did a very good job of avoiding extreme amounts of fetch quests and when fetch quests occures they even acknowledge it.
-The monsters in this game all serve a meaning and balence the game very well.
-The villian in this game changed alot during the course of the game. He starts out as the most steriotypical villian I have ever seen and by the end I was beyond sad for him. During the final battle while I was at the edge of victory I lost on to him just to see if their would be another ending if I lost. I didnt feel very good about winning in the end either. In all this villian when from bland to making me look bland.
-The proggresion in this game may be strait forward but it works very well. It makes you stronger through the entire game and give you options to your playstyle.
-Their are more cat puns then you will ever need
-Cons-
-At the end of the game the world goes from a massive open area to a small area due to the flying abilty it lets you travel the world at insane speed compared to before. It may seem really cool at first but I think it takes alot away from the games feeling.
-After you win the final battle their isnt to much to do. You can clean up any side quests you have left and go slay the hidden ocean boss but after that its really just grinding levels and chests to get stronger with no meaning.
-Most items in this game are useless after you start getting gold chests. It just means the base items seem to all become crappy items and the gold chest gear is all you will use.
-If you are looking for a game with a crazy good story this is not for you. I have to say the backstory is very good but the playable in game story in very bland.
-The reason the ending is a con is because I dont think its complete but it may get DLC which would make this already amazing game 10x better.

34507973.review:
Surprisingly good and fluent (although a little simplistic) combat in a world where cats rule - this time literally.
Puns are more hit than miss, stories make sense (usually) and are a blast to go through, very rarely outstaying their welcome. Main story is well thought out and you might want to have a second playthrough to see if you spot some stuff that will make more sense.
Inventory system is a little different -  duplicates level your existing items. This works well for the most part, although if you get a streak of 1 item dups, it gets a little too powerful.

From difficutly perspective, game is definitely on the easier side of things, at least if you use the dodge-roll correctly.

World is consistently built, with characters that just fit in it - from the random villager to main characters they feel a part of it.

Overall it was much better than I expected. While some of the time was just on pause (paws) screen, the ~8 hours of relaxing gameplay was definitely worth the price.
Becomes even more ameowzing if you play it with someone else, as the humour spreads rapidly.

Definite recommendation if you look for a relaxing, yet surprisingly fluent little game. Cats are a bonus ;)

Bought this soon after Cryaotic made a video on it... 

After playing it for 11 hours, I'm really enjoying it. It's simple, pretty and fun. Just like the old school Legend of Zelda games, or other similar RPGs. 

Pros:

- Simple, yet challenging
- Main story is short, but...
- through multiple side quests you learn about the world's history and get stronger.
- Cat-related puns!
- Oh and references. :D

Cons:
- I found it kind of disappointing that you cannot sell unnecessary items. I have tons of armor and weapons I will never use since I'm near the end of the game.
- Grinding levels and getting gold is a bit slow... 
- Mana runs out too quickly. You're forced to melee range to get more. (As a mage it's easy to get killed fast)
- No healing items. Even a simple RPG has them. Then again, they are not needed in this game. Makes your battles a bit more tactical.

All in all, I give this game 8 paws out of ten.

Have furr-tastic fun in this pawsome Cat Quest!

34485532.review:
Cat Quest foi desenvolvido por The Gentlebros.


Enredo: Cat Quest é simples demais no seu enredo e com um pequeno plotwist. Nada absurdo mas basicamente temos que lidar com os dragões que foram liberados e com outros inimigos ao longo da jornada. A busca aqui desde o começo é encontrar sua irmã e também trazer paz para o lugar. Não posso entrar em mais detalhes pois já que o mesmo se baseia nisso e tem um pequeno plottwist, vale a pena conferir você mesmo. O enredo é simples mas para este tipo de jogo funciona bem. 

Missões Principais e Missões secundárias: As missões principais são ótimas e bem desenvolvidas. Sim, são simples. Porém, para um jogo casual são divertidas e com diálogos divertidos. O mesmo pode se dizer sobre as missões secundárias que são várias. Elas não tem uma complexidade. Porém, aumenta o tempo de jogatina e também consegue manter o jogador preso. O motivo? por mais que seja tudo simples demais em questão de enredo tanto na principal quanto nas secundárias o jogo entrega bastante humor também. As missões são simples, mas funcionam bem e algumas certas missões você poderá sim, passar trabalho.

Jogabilidade: Excelente e com suporte a controle e de fácil adaptação tanto no teclado quanto no controle. Basicamente usamos o mouse para atacar e alguns botões do teclado para derrotar os inimigos com poderes. Também entrando nesta questão: Os poderes são legais e cada um tem efeito positivo e negativo nos inimigos. Você pode obter todos durante a campanha principal e missões secundárias. São bem feitos e com ótimos visuais. Basicamente tudo que você vai encontrar no mapa (bem bonito e variado) são diversas missões e sides quests que vão te dar experiência e dinheiro, é legal fazer todas já que o jogo é fácil de se obter todas as conquistas e aumenta a vida útil do jogo. 

Obs: sempre vasculhar todas as áreas das dungeons (cavernas) pois o jogo tem muitos itens que vão desde os baús dourados (itens poderosos) até os baús comuns. Se não achar algum item, vá até os vendedores espalhados pelo mapa, eles vão te ajudar (Desde que tenha dinheiro).


Armaduras, itens: Temos vários itens para coletar durante a jogatina que vão desde armaduras, espadas, machados, helmets e muito mais. São todos bastante variados e a maioria deles se encontra nas cavernas do jogo. Todos possuem seus pontos negativos e positivos, assim afetando o seu personagem de diversas maneiras. O legal é que temos os sets completos no jogo. Então da pra ficar brincando e variando o personagem. Também temos os itens lendários que são super simples mas que deixam o jogo ainda mais fácil (não chega a ser um ponto negativo). Mas vale a pena equipar estes itens e se sentir o mais poderoso de todos. Lembrando que nosso personagem aprende a andar pelas águas e também a voar. Isso para um gato não faz sentido né? pois é, mas estamos falando de um jogo que realmente brinca com isso e consegue por sí só trazer extrema diversão e satisfação.

Trilha Sonora: Simples e bem executada combinando perfeitamente com a ambientação do jogo e mudando nas batalhas mais desafiadoras.

Personagens: Controlamos nosso personagem durante a aventura e seu pequeno amigo (fantasma) e temos que lidar com a maioria das situações. Nosso personagem é praticamente calado, mas o fantasminha tem seu carisma de sobra, assim como nosso inimigo e os personagens do mapa que são extremamente carismáticos e conseguem tirar um sorriso do jogador. (Os desenvolvedores também deixam nas entrelinhas uma pequena informação sobre uma possível DLC com cachorros) Idéia genial. Os inimigos são bem variados também.

Gráficos, ambientação, mapa: Os gráficos todos coloridos e extremamente bem feitos, isso aliado a ambientação perfeita e boa variação nas cavernas (dungeons) e locais para explorar. O level design das missões (cavernas) são bem variadas. Se vamos falar de mapa, temos aqui um mapa bem grande para um jogo deste porte, o mapa realmente é bem grandinho e com muitas coisas para fazer e tudo muito bonito. É óbvio que não é enorme como um RPG mais sério, mas foi feito com carinho e amor pelos desenvolvedores. Que são ótimos em responder todas as dúvidas por sinal.

Pontos negativos:

- Falta de idioma Português - Brasil.
- 6 - 8 horas se você jogar só a principal.
- O chefe final é extremamente fácil e isso pode decepcionar os jogadores.
- Caso acabe não achando algum item (como aconteceu no meu caso) prepare-se para fazer grind e acumular dinheiro para comprar os baús dourados e obter o item. Pode demorar muito até conseguir e isso pode irritar demais os jogadores já que na compra dos baús (que também estão pelo mapa) tudo vem de forma randomica ou seja: se falta apenas 1 item, prepare-se para gastar mais algumas horas em busca do mesmo.

Sobre o preço: Eu peguei o jogo por 20 reais, obtive mais de 10 horas com o mesmo e me diverti bastante ao longo das missões secundárias e primárias. O humor do jogo, a ambientação, gráficos coloridos e vibrantes são ótimos, os diálogos entre personagens e o vilão acabam por deixar o jogo ainda mais gratificante e bem humorado. 

Se você procura um jogo leve, bonito e casual e quer simplesmente relaxar de outros jogos com dificuldade mais alta. Vá e pegue Cat quest que vai valer o preço full para você.

Já se você é um jogador que gostou do jogo mas achou o preço salgado, recomendo com 30% de desconto.

No geral Cat quest me divertiu e rendeu boas horas de humor e diversão e exploração do seu mapa. 

Vale a pena!

34484807.review:
I highly recommend this game to anyone who is new to RPGs, struggles with twitch gameplay, and/or loves cats.



When I play games, I like to play strategy and management games, almost exclusively. I find anything as fast-paced and hectic as Cat Quest to be infuriating instead of fun. But I learned to really love this odd little game - enough to write a review.



Cat Quest is an RPG to the core. It has loot, quests, enemy animations, various class builds, and more. It is not a terribly deep game, and a novice player like myself neared 100% completion in about 3 days of sick leave and 10 hours of gameplay. Instead of being a strike against Cat Quest, I think the length and variety is just enough to suck in players like myself.


I'm hooked. I want more Cat Quest. I want more games like Cat Quest. I'll never play Dark Souls or Dante's Inferno - but with promises of new content from the developers, I'll be playing Cat Quest for a long time to come.


Not to mention... I really want to try a Ninja build.

34474613.review:
This was simply a-meow-zing to play.

Chock full of cat puns and visuals, there is little to dislike about the game. A top down ARPG with everything centered around cats, what could possibly go wrong? Melee attacks are assigned to one button with a simple 3 hit combo, regardless of weapons. Magic however can get pretty interesting. There are 4 slots to equip different spells each being assigned to a trigger or shoulder button. In practice this a fun way to mix and match the spells to counter enemies.

The majority of the adventure has you on a map overworld searching for dungeons. The first few hours feel fresh, however this gameplay loot repeats for the remainder of the game. Quests are all fetch/kill quests which have you go to another dungeon. While the game pokes fun at this RPG trope, it also follows it to a T. 

My only real gripe has to do with the nature of chests. There is only one or two chests available in each dungeon and they do not reset upon completion. Depending on your look you could get a great item that you want, or a useless one. Getting a repeat item from the chest simply upgrades it. When going for the achievement for obtaining all items I had to do quite a bit of extra grinding since each roll is against the entire set of equipment.

Definitely a fun little jaunt if you don't mind the repition.

34472561.review:
Interested in a game where you can turn your brain off while enjoying cute visuals that have more polish then most indie titles in this genre? Then Cat Quest is for you. It's smooth and simplistic gameplay combined with low consequences for failure made this a fun game to play while catching up on podcasts.

If you're looking for story, you won't find it here. The end makes a half hearted attempt at causing feels, but mostly sticks to the breezy, no greater impact tone from the rest of the game. Your actions are less about helping the 'peasants' and more about getting that next guiding arrow to appear. Which was rewarding in it's own way.

Misc.

*While you can complete the main quest with minimal grinding, my current attempt to 100% the game involved me going to the two lv99 caves over and over again.

*The randomized leveling of equipment solved some of the problems RPGs have of never using a piece of armor again after finding something better, but there was still a bunch of stuff I never used.

*Only once did I change my build. The gameplay neither encourages or discourages trying different spells or proficiencies.

34428290.review:
身为吸猫人士，玩的很开心，动作挺流畅的，怪也不难打，画风可爱。通关后很期待下作，被放出来的恶龙和狗国，难度也不高，主线剧情和支线剧情都很喜欢，虽然前期没拿到飞行差点跑断腿，拿完三圣器后勇气笑哭我了
简易攻略：
1、吸猫人士慎入
2、这个游戏最重要的是滚，不多贪，打完就滚
3、拿到飞行再做俩兄妹(东西城的那个）不然会跑断腿
4、后期刷经验在猫之禁地（也可去隐藏洞穴，95级后大概1.5次一级），刷钱在黑森林
5、海盗宝藏在冰旁边的海，飞完全程的到达目的地要用走（先后顺序：未知→双城→猫之湖→冬季之际旁边的冰界→目的地）
6、技能推荐咕噜之炎，喵喵陷阱，疯疯喵，冰冻之爪（个人最喜欢喵喵陷阱放着就跑，看着对方慢慢死）
7、拿到水上行走后不要急，往西南方绅士小镇拿钥匙，然后地下城的宝箱都能开了
8、三圣器：意志力在冰的0级灌木丛，信念在99级的隐藏洞穴，勇气在200级的孤独洞穴。灌木丛那有点难找，在有叉叉的那个宝箱那有一个经验拿了后继续完右走有三个宝箱，拿完后继续往右就有意志力了。隐藏洞穴也是一个套路（只是这个没有经验要找路，就一个凸处）。建议顺序：灌木丛→隐藏洞穴→孤独洞穴
9、打喵苏鲁：拿完信念后，用喵喵陷阱，引怪，边走边放，然后Boss就死了

34416632.review:
[i]Cat Quest虽未明说儿童向，不过就当儿童向看待吧(・∀・(・∀・笑~[/i]
挺不错的一款游戏，游戏不大，乐趣不小。本来买来忽悠小朋友的；结果自己玩上了。
[list]
    [*]游戏整体难度不高，通主线剧情约4h，完全通关约10h小时。
游玩起来轻松休闲；很多地方能越级战斗，拿到好装备通关快
[i]达成全成就总体没太大阻碍；呃~有需求的玩家可移步[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1113060955]steam社区Cat Quest指南[/url][/i]

    [*]游戏画风很是可爱，周围都表示喜欢...也吸引部分小朋友[(lll￢ω￢)并不是所有小朋友对这游戏感冒]；剧情现在看来略中二老套；但小朋友倒蛮适合，易懂温和，没有血腥暴力，某些支线小剧情蛮温馨；
(σ｀д′)σ不过对某些地方剧情感到颇为不满，后期揭露BOSS身世的剧情，颜色大红大黑感官刺激较大，语言表述略阴沉，个人觉得这部分不适合小朋友；如果能选择性屏蔽掉或者修改掉这部分就好了。

    [*]游戏不大；更新前约68M，作为RPG的元素基本都有，这款ARPG打击感也做得意外的不错，在一张大地图上升级打怪无需读图；大地图展示缩放都给人不错的感觉。

    [*]游戏简化了繁琐的战斗设定，装备设定等等，捡到同种装备会在原装备升级(省去搭配更换装备)；不存在消耗品，技能点；游戏只需不断拿装备，有钱抽装备；升级技能就行；没有什么装备要在固定地点更换，装备分解强化这些繁琐设定(ˉ﹃ˉ)...挺适合小朋友的，不像大部分RPG，要不连贯通关，隔几天游戏设定忘记点，都不知道从哪下手。
[i]不过，如果不当儿童游戏来看，整体像怪物种类武器装备数量种类都偏少，至于二周目游玩内容根本没有。[/i]

    [*]游戏任务标示做出足够的标示与简化，每次只标示一个，简单明了；地图整体不大路线标示清楚，跑图不会产生烦躁的情绪或者迷路之类的；小朋友也不会玩一会就扔手柄...[不过前期学会水上漂与飞行术之前跑图还是偏慢，没有急行术么？笑~]
[/list]

[h1][b][推荐][/b][/h1]
整体看来是较不错的游戏，就现在自己来看作为RPG是各方面元素少了一点，也没有其他的游戏那么耐玩。
不过带着小朋友一起玩倒是挺不错的，剧情画风可爱温馨，游戏简洁易上手。
而且自己买来玩也是没有问题的吧，很多东西慢慢就变味了，简单轻松的玩玩不是也挺好，笑~
[strike]首发42元[/strike]折后33元；建议折后购买，原价略高。

话说制作组不考虑加上本地双人联机(亲子乐么~)

[i]感谢您花费宝贵的时间阅读。[/i]

34407018.review:
I was a little hesitant about the small file size and low price at first. I decided to take the plunge and 104 hours later (and a whisker past half-way through the game) I do not regret one single penny. I was even further impressed when I found my old HP Touchsmart would actually run it, and quite well at that. 

There's quite a lot to say about this game so I suppose I'll start with asthetics and graphics. Cat Quest is f*****g adorable! The colors are bright and vivid, even on my old deck, The way you play on the map is unique in that you traverse across the literal map. There's no getting lost and when you play it you'll see why. The movement and combat animations are gorgeus and it feels good to run around smashing quests and slaying dragons. 

The gameplay itself is smooth as you lope gracefully across the map like a glorious lion. The difficulty level is right in that sweet spot between challenging and satisfying. The simple control scheme makes this a relaxing hack and slash when you need it or an intense firestorm when you want it. 

If you like cat puns, you'll squee as you read the dialogue. Unfortunately there is no voice acted dialogue but I don't feel like that takes away from the game. In fact, I think it adds to the simple charm of it. The writing is witty and the references are amusing and clever. Gentlebros managed to pack a lot of game into such a small file.

All of these elements culminate to create a bright, epic adventure filled with fierce battles and cat-astrophic puns. Cat quest is a good investment for any gamer who enjoys rpgs and cats. Especially cats. I got it for the cats.

Did I mention you play as a cat? 

When it comes to Cat Quest, curiosity might've killed the cat but satisfaction brought it back!

34387242.review:
猫ちゃんが可愛かったので一目惚れして購入しました。
プレイ：2周ぐらいしました。
操作：マウス＆キーボード

良い点
・操作性が良くてストレスフリー。スキルなども
　マウス一つで簡単に扱えて良かったです。
・ゲームバランスが非常に良くて慣れてくると
　レベルの高い強敵でもテクニカルに倒せます。
・アイテム集めが楽しい。更にネタ装備なども
　あり着せ替え要素もGOOD。
・BGMも世界観にマッチして大変に評価できる。
・とある武器の下方修正が良かった。デメリットを
　差し引いてもチート性能な武器だった為にナイス修正。
　(通常イベントで簡単に手に入る。)
・ネクロポチコン(心が汚れていると読み間違える。)

悪い点
・金の宝箱がお高い(5000G)。洞窟にも配置されているが
　同じ装備が出るため未回収装備等があると最後は
　これに頼る事になる。
　最終的な稼ぎポイントも1000G辺りなので
　コンプリートするまでの作業感が否めない。
・装備のレベル上げが非常に面倒。お店でひたすら
　Eキーを連打すればよいが一回の上昇値が1～4程度
　なので99にするにはかなりの手間がかかる。
　(更に99にした装備も出る。)
・フリ－ジングＰが万能すぎる。後半は敵の攻撃が
　格段に早く多くなるため被ダメを減らすために
　これを当てれるかがポイントとなる。

総評
非常にオススメです。装備の個性が細かく設定されており
パワープレイ、制限プレイ、お洒落プレイ、ＲＴＡと
お好きなプレイスタイルで遊べるのが大変に評価できました。

Cat Quest is a cute RPG, Open world, game. If you are like me and like the types of games like Dragon Quest and Final Fanasty this is a game for you, it colourful cute and unqiue in it's style. I highly recommend it especially if you just finished an emoticanlly charged game. Cat Quest will make you feel relax.

I know I sound like a copypasta strainght from the description box of a game but what I say is true. However I have a couple of cons:
- I need more, it was too short for my liking. The game has lots of potential for lots more, I feel it could use a lot more of the elements for an open world RPG. For example more story, more equiment, more side quests to offer. That sort of thing. Now for the record as of the date I was writing this I have heard of no new updates for it, yes the game hints at more but currently I have heard of no updates. 

-The controls could be a bit better, if you are playing this I recommend playing with an controller instead of the mouse and arrow keys. I found it a lot more easier and adaptable with a controller.

Other  than those cons. The game is a really fun, casual game to play to relax with and recomend playing it if you are into these types of games and if you have a strng tolerance for puns as the cat puns in this game are endless.

前期法术加血不要点优先火和地刺...地刺+冰+火一套下去遇神杀神遇佛杀佛，如果没死？再来一套......变大这个我没怎么用，基本上1000法伤之后不需要开变大伤害也足够了。
世界boss全场最强克总......是65风筝死的那时候还没发现地刺那么神纯靠10级火烧死的，很累。
刷钱去程序员岛的洞；刷经验去禁地用地刺大法带着那里的怪绕圈，刷完存个档小退刷新小怪，5分钟之内90变100......
打折买的开始感觉好像还有点贵了，但是玩完实在是感觉钱没白花，很满足。
期待更新猫狗大战~

34344947.review:
This game is a hidden gem. The tone and artistic style are laid back and casual, a trait that is rare for RPGs, and the gameplay is more rewarding than the preview images imply. I think downloading the demo and giving it a shot is the best choice.

The rest of this review is somewhat critical. 

The time you can put into this game is nowhere near 10 hours. You can get that much time if you are a completionist, but you will not get the kind of time if you are a normal, not achievement hunting gamer like me. My 6.4 hours is accurate of the entire time I played and enjoyed this game. You may not enjoy buying this game if you expect a dollar-to-hour enjoyed ratio. 

Cat Quest is fun, but it is way too short for its listed price.

34344118.review:
太好玩了，不能自拔。连续十小时，做完了所有主线支线任务，探索了所有地下城，达成了所有成就。我知道相较于大佬来说，我的通关时间有些长，但是它真的给我带来了许多乐趣。

     刚开始玩时不了解游戏机制，一直感觉背包要满了，满地图找商店，想卖装备。多开了几个箱子才发现获得相同的装备会升级……；穿了一身加物攻的装备，放技能，怪物都是“-10”，“-10”地掉血，要知道我砍一下可是“-400+”的，感觉游戏出了bug，后来知道了那个魔法数值和魔攻有关……在这之前我以为只是魔法量。作为一个手残党，我玩这种RPG游戏都会在一个地方练级到足够压制主线怪再去做任务，这个游戏当然也是如此，在猫咪禁地练到了100级（话说我的时间原来都耗在这儿了），然后碾压通关。网上说这个游戏有三个神器，但是目前我只找到了两个，“信念”和“意志力”，第三个完全没有头绪，估计以后官方更新会加入吧。

    优点显而易见， 游戏音乐欢快，不同的场景有不同的配乐，都十分好（Mo）听（Xing），开放世界，故事情节紧凑，战斗系统我非常喜欢，有技能预判区，对手残（我）十分友好，占用小，容量大（其实也不小了，最初下的时候68M，刚刚我看了一下游戏文件夹，有230M了已经）。

     再来说说它的不足之处，关于金钥匙，我在去绅士岛做金钥匙任务之前，已经清理了好多洞穴，拿到金钥匙后，我还要挨个进我刷完的洞穴里打开金箱子……然而我已经忘了哪个洞穴有箱子了，直到现在，我还是感觉有几个洞穴的金箱子没有打开（残念）；当做完全部任务，无事可做，玩家就没有玩下去的动力了，希望加入一些可以重复做的任务，一些等级随玩家等级变化的洞穴。还有一些不能算是不足之处的地方，应该是官方还没有填这些坑，比如地图里随处可见的石碑，一直提示“还有更多石碑”，但是就算调查了所有石碑也还是什么都没有发生，还有“三神器”之类的。

    总的来说，这是一款值得入手的游戏，说实话，当我体验到68M的游戏有这么多内容的时候是有些惊喜的。期待官方更新加入更多元素。

セール時に購入しエンディングを迎えたので軽く感想を。

メインクエストを重点的に進め３時間程で全クリアしました。
サブクエストだったり他のやりこみ要素をしっかりやっていけば倍はかかると思います。

・良かったところ
物語（サブクエ）のシナリオが良く次へ次へと進めてしまう。
装備の強化システムが最近のソシャゲに似ており、同じアイテムを獲得したらレベル（性能）が上がる仕様。

・悪かったところ
翻訳の意味がなんとなく範囲でガバっている。もう少し頑張ってほしかった。
モンスター毎に攻撃パターンがある為、慣れてしまうのとただの作業になってしまう。
オープンワールドとしては少し狭すぎた感じがある。

総評として、今回１０００円で購入した分には十分満足のいく出来あった為、みなさんも是非プレイして楽しんで頂きたい作品です！

34334077.review:
Cat quest is a quick and fun little rpg, for those of you that just want to see a world filled with.. odd.. cats, and smash things for a while, this'd be a great game for you. The game has quite a bit of content, the world is incredibly small but still managed to take up 2 days to actually play through. Anyway, let's see if i can manage a pro and con of the game.. 

Pro's : 
Adorable style and characters
Great humour, even without "swears" although they do exist in meows.. godcatit.. where was i going with this..
References :D
The story is great! though, you have to let yourself get lost in the world to learn lore and actually explore a little
The combat is GREAT! Even as limited as it is, I very much enjoyed it. It does get frustrating at times, though that's because I was stubborn.. 

Cons - The side quests can get repetetive occasionally, though they are fun, and you do have to do a lot of them to be able to beat the game and be strong enough

TLDR : It's MEOWING amazin. Worth the money and will return to it once I've forgotten about it

34328892.review:
メインストーリークリアまでに9時間弱
そこから全実績解除に2時間程遊べました。
バグにも一切出会わず、非常に丁寧な作りという印象がまず第一です。

デモ絵からも見れるように、昔のゼルダ〇伝説のような見下ろしアクション。
懐かしくもあり、どこかニヤけてしまうような可愛らしいグラフィックがそそります。
曲数はそれほど多くはないですが、どれもワクワク感や緊張感をしっかり演出してます。
デモ映像のフィールド曲だけでも、冒険心が駆り立てられます。

オープンワールドで、多くのダンジョンが設置されています。
が、謎解き要素などはそれほど含まれていません。
操作も至ってシンプル。攻撃、魔法、回避(メニュー)
複雑なコンボ入力などは存在せず、戦闘面では敵との駆け引きみたいなのを重視しているようでした。
シームレスに進むため、距離感やタイミングを意識する必要があり臨場感があります。やってみるとこれが楽しいです。
理不尽がなく、またヌル過ぎずで敵のバランスもよくとれてました。

武器、頭、体の３つからなる装備が多く存在しており、それらを着せ替え感覚で自由に付け替えられます。
自身のプレイスタイルや敵に合わせて装備を変えていくのは目と手の両面で楽しめました。

ストーリー面は、大筋に加え１つ数分で終わるサブクエスト式のサイドストーリーが大量に用意されています。
ネコをテーマの主軸とし、いずれも可愛らしいキャラクターがたくさん出てきます。
・・・シナリオもしっかり練られているのでしょうが・・・後述の理由から、ここは本当に惜しい……


不満点を上げるとするならば、他のユーザー様もおっしゃってる通り日本語訳に違和感があり過ぎるところでしょうか。
せっかくのストーリーも感情移入しづらい場面が多々ありました。
途中までは、生粋のジャパニーズである身でなんとか理解しようと試みていましたが・・・後半の文章はもうほとんど諦め、流し見てましたね。
とはいえその場の雰囲気と愛情でカバーできるのなら問題はないでしょう…

あと、キー設定が設けられてないです。
慌てて回避をする際に何度メニュー画面を開いたことか・・・最初は慣れが必要かもしれません。
バージョンアップでオプション面にも音量調整などの追加要素がありましたので、今後は操作面でも調整可になるのを期待。


日本語訳は仕方ないとして・・・内容は総じて、高評価なのも納得の良作品でした。

難しく考えなくてよく、それほど時間もかけず、日常に癒し(ﾈｺ)とちょっとだけの刺激が欲しい方に
オススメです。

Don't get me wrong, this game is quite enjoyable and fun.  But the novelty wears off fairly quickly and then you are left with the tedious task of doing repetitive quests over and over again, and slashing enemies with the same attack moves over and over again.  The game doesn't pace itself with better "revelations" later on in the game, and this means that what you get early in the game is pretty much how the game will feel later on in the game.

I wouldn't recommend buying this game for the current price.  Perhaps when it is on sale.

Also, be forewarned that the game isn't challenging, especially if you do the main quests when you are at the recommened character level.

Still unsure?
Watch this review
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z6pXKZZ_BRE

34300436.review:
Сразу начну с того, что это вторая из самых позитивных игр, что я видел (первая была Slime Rancher).
Главный герой игры - безымянный котик, потерявший сестру от злого белого кота мага, по имени Дракоз. Задача мальца простая - стать сильнее и выследить похитителя. И тут начинается всё приключение, так как здесь, как и во всякой РПГ, вас не сковывает никакими ограничениями, позволяя браться за любые задания, и фармить хоть целыми часами, как в диабло. Диалоги в игре - одна из самых приятных деталей, благо даже в них немало комедийности и позитива, при том, атмосфере общей картины они нисколечко не вредят, хотя, что стоит отметить, разрабы изрядно постарались, особенно в плане троллинга игроков)

Визуальная часть одна из самых приятных в игре. Мир выполнен в виде географической карты и, несмотря на его, казалось бы, сомнительные размеры, бегать по нему придётся долго, особенно если вы из тех, кто хочет обследовать каждый уголок. Мультяшный стиль на протяжении всей игры будет сохранять позитивное настроение, а про котиков-нпс я вообще молчу, благо так хорошо нарисованны персонажи и, чёрт возьми, как мило звучит их мурлыканье)

Музыкальное сопровожение сделанно достаточно приятным и не навязчивым, что добавляет лишний плюс игре. Помимо того, под каждый момент в каждом задании (да что уж там - под каждый момент в диалоге) звучит своя тема, котороя либо задаёт позитива, либо нагнетает атмосферу напряжением, мрачностью, или же состраданием.

Геймплей - элемент, который прост настолько, что жаловаться на отсутствие возсможности перенастроить управление ну просто смешно. Вы можете бегать и бить врагов... всё) Хотя нет, на правой кнопке мыши есть магия, для которой выделенно четыре слота, заставляя игрока выбирать наиболее полезные для него заклинания. Помимо того, в игре есть уворот, который очень пригодится даже в бою с простейшими врагами. Однако не стоит обманываться простотой геймплея, ибо враги в игре не так просты - зазевайтесь в бою с серьёзным простивником (или даже с обычным мобом) и тут же отправитесь на ближайший сейв-поинт, коим тут выступают либо доски с заданием, либо домики для отдыха.

Итого - ещё одна игра, которую можно смело рекомендовать всем, особенно тем, кто любит котиков, дракончиков и просто красивые позитивные игры. В целом, по большей части это творение напомнило мне сразу две игры: Slime Rancher - за счёт своей нескончаемо позитивной и приятной атмосферы; и Dust: An Elysian Tail - за счёт качественной мультяшной стилистики и необычного сюжета, который раскрывается так же ближе к концу.

是一款开放类rpg换装游戏，游戏休闲，玩法简单，故事讲诉一个[strike] 妹控[/strike]哥哥为了找回妹妹不惜屠龙灭怪，还做一个跑腿员，还得假装高冷把话语权交给一个小光球的故事。。。。

游戏分歧点在拿到水上漂后，可以选择默默继续普通rpg游戏路线，也可以选择跑去主角出生地下面的大岛拿金钥匙玩奇迹喵喵。

游戏主流程很短，三四个小时就可以玩完，价格上来说也算可以了。[spoiler] 铲屎官大赚[/spoiler]

游戏讲诉着平凡的大陆有着一群不平凡的喵喵在生活着，他们会说人类的语言会飞天下海，他们每天都有着各种各样的烦恼，但依旧顽强得生活着。这难道不正是我们人类的写照吗?因此我得出一个结论，那些喵星人实际上是某些铲屎官吸猫过度导致变态了成猫型生物，真是石乐志。

在此奉劝各位一句：珍爱生命，理性吸猫

画风非常的萌，剧情也挺不错的，最后的结局倒是有些出乎意料。战斗系统上手很简单，不过鉴于游戏的容量极小，所以导致战斗模式单一，怪物的种类也比较少，怪物的技能和主角的技能是完全一样的，没有任何独特的技能。装备很多但是能用的其实也没有几件。全成就很简单，大家可以去steam上的指南找到全成就的方法。

打法上建议升级疯疯喵（变大技能）、重击爪（这个技能带吸血）和喵喵陷阱（主力输出技能）。疯疯喵配合喵喵陷阱输出极高完全可以越很多级打怪，没血的时候放重击爪回血。基本上这套技能配合下来所有的怪都能一次性打过。装备推荐信念、意志力和海盗宝藏开出的那件99级的衣服，装备的具体位置社区指南里面有攻略。

总的来说这种剧情有趣，画风萌，战斗轻松的游戏，非常值得大家入手玩玩。

34268839.review:
XBOX Oneコントローラーを使用。クリア済み。

[h1]良い点[/h1]

・ストーリーのあらすじはストアページに記載されているので割愛する。良くも悪くも王道を行っている物語なので、とっつき易い。主人公は選ばれし者で攫われた誰某を助けに行くというやつだ。

・キャラクターが可愛い。モフモフしていて癒される。道中に言動が外見とマッチしていない奴もいるが概ね翻訳のせい。主人公の外見は後述する装備品によって多少変わる。

・アクションは攻撃、回避、魔法と非常にシンプルになっている。敵との戦闘は適正レベルであればそれ程難しくはないので、アクションが苦手な方でも問題なくプレイできるだろう。逆にアクションが得意な方であれば少し敵レベルの高い場所やダンジョンへ行っても、回避等で対処可能だろう。勿論、敵のHPが高いので撃破するまで時間はかかるが。

・魔法は全部で七種類存在し、攻撃、回復、強化、トラップと各種揃っている。個人的には後半で入手できる強化魔法がお気に入り。魔法にはレベルが存在し、入手後はお金を支払うことで強化も可能。ただし、本当の意味での遠距離攻撃は魔法でも存在しないので、一部スリリングなバトルが楽しめる。

・装備品は宝箱から入手できるが、所謂ガチャのようなシステムになっていて、入っている装備がランダムになっている。すでに所持している装備を再度入手すると装備レベルが上昇し強化される。宝箱はダンジョン等で入手できる以外にもお店でお金を払って購入（ガチャを回す感じ）できる。

・上記したように装備品や魔法のレベルが存在しているので、自キャラのレベルが低くともその他のレベルを上げることによって色々と対処可能になっている。これによって、何を強化するか、プレイヤーごとの個性がでる。

・サイドクエストが豊富でストーリーが面白いものが多い。

[h1]悪い点[/h1]

・（[u]8月16日時点[/u]）日本語翻訳が一部おかしい。進行に問題が発生する程ではないが、重要キャラの喋り方が統一されていなかったり、「過去形」であるはずのフレーズが「現在進行形」だったり。特に喋り方が変わるのは違和感がある。主人公の相棒のスピリー等が面白いキャラなだけに残念。

・メインストーリーが少し短めになっている。サイドクエストを進行してレベルを上げてから進めることになる場合が多いが、メインのみで見ると短い。

[h1]総評[/h1]

気を抜くとやられてしまうこともあるが、基本的には緩めのアクションRPGになっている。是非、ネコ達に癒されながらプレイしてもらいたい。余談だが、制作者曰く、サイドクエストが追加予定とのこと。

プレイ動画をアップしているので、気になった方は[u][url=https://youtu.be/1CD0neMW8Hk]こちら[/url][/u]を参考までにどうぞ。

34254036.review:
Pour moi ce jeu est une bonne surprise.

Déjà les graphismes sont très jolis et la prise en main est rapide.

Côté scénario c'est très limité au début mais ça s'étoffe un peu par la suite, notamment via les quêtes secondaires. Ca reste basique mais je serais curieux d'en découvrir plus, il y a du potentiel.

Avis aux amateurs de commerce et de tourisme : le jeu se concentre uniquement sur l'action et il n'y a ni achat/vente aux PNJ, ni visite de villages. Ce point-là m'a un peu déçu car si la zone principale (carte du monde) est bien travaillée, elle manque de diversité.

Ce qui m'a le plus ennuyé dans ce jeu c'est l'overdose de chats : personnages, objets, dialogues... tout y passe. J'aurais préféré des jeux de mots moins fréquents mais avec plus d'impact.

En résumé c'est un bon petit jeu à prix plus que correct. Compte-tenu de la durée de vie (~10h) et du système de jeux, je le conseille à des casus qui ne veulent pas d'une usine à gaz (gestion de trois tonnes d'équipement/caractéristiques/sorts...).

34251973.review:
I love this game. I highly recommend it to everyone and have been annoying all my friends (well, used to be my friends) by recommending it and throwing cat puns into my conversation (hence the "used to be"). Open World Action RPG filled with Cats and Punnery.

Pros:
  - Combat controls feel good. You have a melee attack, a dodge roll, and spells you can assign to the shoulder buttons. 
  - The main story and the side quests are well written.
  - The game is adorably drawn. 
  - Good humor and excessive cat puns (that last might be a negative :) 
  - Rewarding loot and gear leveling system.

Cons:
  - Limited # of enemy types. 
  - Systems aren't very deep. The combat and gear and leveling are great, imo, but some might find it lacking. For example, you have only 3 stats: health, attack, magic. Another, you have only melee, no ranged weapons (though spells provide some range).
  - It eventually ends, and that will make you sad.

34237685.review: There's one word that comes to my mind when playing Cat Quest - and it's "delight". The game is just perfectly lovely, with smooth controls, charming graphics, decent loot progression (that is, nearly everything you find is interesting/upgrade to a piece of gear you have and so on) and simple, but quite sweet plot. It's not a hard game; the playstyle really reminds me of simpler Crashlands, with enemies telegraphing their attack areas and top-down, 2d graphics. Neither is it very long or complex - Path of Exile with its myriad builds or Dark Souls with its Dark-Souls-ness it ain't, but frankly, the older I get the less time I have for gaming - and the more delightful such reasonably-sized gems are. If you'd like an ARPg that's perfect for a ten minute stint during a break, or you want to escape for a while to a charming, kitten-filled world, don't hesitate to buy Cat Quest.

34237142.review:
EDIT: The game DOES have a proper settings menu now, but it is still exceedingly basic (The game is very easy to run though, so that shouldn't be an issue for anyone).

While the game doesn't fulfill my standard of at least 1 hour of play time to $1 of purchase value, the game is just so charming and satisfying I still think it's worth it.

The best way I can describe this game is baby's first Dark Souls - it has the dodge rolling and everything. If you don't try to dodge enemy attacks all the time, you will  get absolutely wrecked,  but fortunately every single enemy attack in the game comes with a big ring or hit area showing you where not to be (which, later on in the game, is anywhere close to the monster!)

The progression in the game is also very well done, being mainly achieved through weapon and armor upgrades/unlocks found in chests throughout the world or randomly found in the blacksmith for a fee.

Though it is extremely basic, it doesn't need to be anything more. Aside from a few small polish issues and a complete lack of a proper options/settings menu, the game a solid purchase even for the asking price - though it wouldn't hurt to let it go on sale first considering the game's length is generally going to be less than 10 hours.

34229480.review:
高評価をされたレビューがいくつも投稿されていたこともあり購入してみましたが、買って大正解でした。
派手さこそありませんが、キャラクターの軽やかな動作に加えてアクション部分も爽快感に溢れており、実にストレス無くプレイできます。
また各種操作もゲーム中でわかりやすく説明されており、タイミングを見て連続攻撃を叩き込んだり、あるいは回避をしながら相手の体力を削っていったりなど、上記と併せてアクションPPGとしての大切な要素はしっかりと抑えてあります。
さらにRPGにありがちな長すぎる前置きなども無く、開始後すぐに作品世界へと入っていける点も好印象ですね。
まだ序盤のみのプレイではありますが、難易度も高すぎず、さらにはフィールドマップを歩き回りながら様々な場所を探索できる自由度の高さも備えているので、心地よく快適にストーリーを進めていくことができます。

とにかく軽快でストレスの無いアクションRPGがやりたい！という方にはぜひお勧めしたいですね。
もちろん可愛いキャラクターを操作して遊びたいという方にもばっちりお勧めできますよ。
メインストーリー以外にもサブクエストが豊富に用意されているようなので、そちらも楽しめそうです。

34228267.review:
(Pros and Cons at the bottom)


I have clocked in almost 7 hours into this game and completed the main story and I can safely say that I personally felt like I could have spent money wiser, yet, Im glad I spent the money to buy it.  The gameplay first off is a Real time RPG adventure,  where you level up and gain stats, along with magic and swordsmanship, thats... your whole arssenal of offensive weaponry. However, there are Body and Head wear that increase your Health,Attack,Armour, and Magic, however, some armor tend to take away stats instead of increase it. Leaving you 3 diffrent ways to play the game, and you can shift these weapons without worry, of having to grind more, you can shift playstyles as much as you'd like, and as often as you'd like. You also have the capability to roll, making you wanna make out with your space bar with how much you'll be rolling, it almost makes the game too easy, but if you tend to dodge into the wrong directions, (you can roll by pressing space and any direction on the arrow keys) you can take a hefty ammount of damage when up against the wrong enemy. The magic has really neat effects to help you, and to be able to combo into physical attacks, and can let you attack during a roll... yet, the magic can be really busted if used correctly, but the healing paw is the worst with how if costs so much mp, yet, it heals worth crap.

Now, the story... honestly isnt something specactular, first off, you are sailing across the ocean when a white cat named Drakoth destroys your ship and takes away your sister. (Ala; LoZ Windwaker) So now you must head off with your guardian spirit Spirri to save your sister by defeating Drakoth's 4 dragons. The story is simple yet easy to follow, even doing the sidequests give more info into the inhabitants of the land of Felingard, even hinting at other species living off in the distance, however, the story quickly throws you for multiple loops at the end of the game, where it just throws plot twist after plot twist at you, where it seems like they tried to reveal the plot twists in impactful ways, however, they dont really succeed since they tell you these plot twists earlier on in the game if you do sidequests, which, the game wants you to do all of em, but, the most irritating thing about these sidequest storylines is that the lore you learn from it never really matters in the end, it seems like endless tagging on. And speaking of sidequests, 3 of them arent even lore related, these 3 are either ads, promises of seeing more races other than cats, and the game developers litterally fucking with you. 

Now, balancing is hard to do, and this game is proof of how hard it is, when you get armor or weapons for the first time, they are permanantly in your inventory, and if you collect them again, the weapon or armor levels up, and the stats increase. This can get very broken with a vast ammount of the weapons  and armors yeilding negative stats more so than the positives, and even then, it locks you out of being able to do both magic and weapons at their strongest unless they come from gold chests, which make it so easy to cheese the game, that its not even worth trying at somepoints, 
the final boss didnt even take 5 minuites to complete, its pathetically easy with how the balancing in this game is off.  and plus you can spend the most easy to obtain money in anything I played to buy random weapons, and to increase the strength of your magic,

the Dialouge isnt the best, it seems forced most of the time, but the puns are nice, and it gave me a few chuckles. its amusing to say the least, but all of the characters seem to not have any personality, if they show it, its usually reversed a few sentances later

And lastly, the visual representation is beyond adorable... allbeit the obsessive use of ritual circles make it tiring to see them... the colors are bright and fun, but, some times, its just solid Red, White or black, and the dungeon themes keep coming back again and again with diffrent layouts, it gets old quickly.

Pros:
-The gameplay is fun, versitile, and can appeal to diffrent playstyles,
-The Writing in humorus and Cat pun filled,
-There are diffrent armor types to appeal to anyone.
-The visuals are cute as fuck (the mage cats are my favorite things ever)
-There are 7 spells that assist you in battle, which helps you out immensly, 

Cons:
-Its super easy to cheese the game, making the difficulty mind numbing
-The characters arent too standoff-ish, I couldnt even remember the guardian spirit's name for the longest time,
-The plot has been done before, but better,
-There are times where the game gets bland and reppetivie in its design and dungeons,
-The game devs seem to troll you with how much deception is going on in most cases,
-The magic is unbalanced unless you pay to upgrade, making them your most powerful tools... a bit... too powerful


Conclusion:
I really like this game, I really do, but it doesnt seem like the game was tested for balancing purposes, Its incredibly easy, yet it punishes you by trolling you with various ways of being unfair to you

For 10 dollars, this does seem like a good game, but if you're looking for a story driven or exploration heavy game, this is not for you, its a relaxing game to play, but not get invested in. 

I reccomend it for its price,

34225669.review:
고양이의 야옹미가 일품인 오픈월드 RPG 게임.

여동생을 납치당하고 어느 거대한 왕국에 표류하게 된 고양이의 여동생을 구하기 위한 모험을 담은 게임이다. 오픈월드 방식의 액션RPG 게임으로 몬스터를 사냥해 경험치와 골드를 획득하고 보물 상자를 열어 무기와 방어구를 획득해 장착하고 퀘스트를 해결해가며 진행하는, 전형적인 핵 앤 슬래쉬 스타일의 RPG 게임이다. 그리고 2등신의 귀염깜찍한 고양이가 주인공인 게임이다. 더불어 고양이가 주인공인 게임답게 게임에 등장하는 고유명사들은 대부분 고양이가 연관되어있다.

일반 공격과 마법을 통해 몬스터들을 사냥해나간다. 몬스터들의 공격 패턴을 적절히 피해가며 평타 치고 마법을 사용하는 재미도 좋고, 게임에 어느 정도 익숙해지고 난 뒤엔 적당히 몬스터들 몰아서 한 번에 사냥하는 재미도 훌륭하다. 대체로 난이도는 쉬운 편이지만, 그래도 지루한 평타 반복보다는 어느 정도 컨트롤의 묘미를 잘 살린 게임이라는 점이 굉장히 마음에 든다. 또한 메인 퀘스트와 사이드 퀘스트의 경우 가야할 곳을 아주 친절히 알려주는 데다가, 줌아웃을 자신의 위치 근처의 맵을 편하게 확인할 수도 있다. RPG 게임으로써의 인터페이스, 그리고 예쁘고 귀여운 고양이가 상당히 잘 갖춰져 있는 게임인 것이다.

다양한 장비와 7가지의 마법이 준비되어있다. 마법의 경우 회복 마법과 6종의 공격 마법이 있는데, 난이도가 쉬운 게임답게 공격 마법들은 전부 가성비가 뛰어나지만 회복 마법은 사용하는 마나에 비해 효율이 조금 떨어진다. 그래도 적들을 패다보면 마나가 알아서 차니 마나 떨어질 걱정은 별로 안하게 된다. 장비들의 경우 보물 상자를 열거나 퀘스트를 통해 획득하고 같은 장비를 획득해 장비를 강화해나간다. 다만 일부 사기급 무기를 제외하면 장비간의 성능 차이가 크게 안 나는 데다가 캣 퀘스트 자체가 워낙이 쉬운 게임이다보니 나중에 가면 결국 아무 장비를 사용해도 큰 차이가 없어져버린다. 물론 귀염둥이 고양이를 꾸미는 데에 정말 요긴하게 쓰이긴 하겠지만 말이다.

추가 컨텐츠가 참 쏠쏠하게 준비되있는 게임이기도 하다. 사이드 퀘스트가 정말 충실하게 준비되있어 메인 퀘스트를 진행하기 위한 경험치와 레벨은 전부 사이드 퀘스트로 챙길 수 있고, 엔딩을 한 차례 본 이후에도 사이드 퀘스트 찾아가며 클리어하는 재미도 훌륭하다. 그 밖에 캣 퀘스트 최강의 몹이 기다리고 있는 '외로운 동굴'과 황금 상자를 열 수 있는 열쇠의 존재, 해적의 메세지를 통해 찾을 수 있는 숨겨진 해적의 보물 같은 것도 준비되어 있다. 몬스터와 NPC의 종류가 한정적이라 똑같은 녀석을 여러 군데 재활용해 써먹는다는 게 조금 아쉽긴 하지만, 고양이가 귀여우니 그런 건 아무래도 상관 없을 것 같다.

상당히 간결하면서도 깔끔하게 구현된 핵 앤 슬래쉬 스타일의 RPG 게임. 가볍게 즐길 수 있는 RPG 게임이니 누구나 쉽게 즐길 수 있는 게임이다. 특히나 고양이를 사랑하는 당신이라면 주저없이 꼭 해봐야 할 명작 게임!! (물론 난 강아지가 더 좋지만...)

Un Action RPG semplice e carino, dalla grafica piuttosto semplice, colorata e divertente.

La storia inizia come una parodia di Skyrim, ma poi prende una piega tutta sua, ovviamente piegata alle esigenze narrative di un mondo fatto tutto di felini.

Non aspettatevi il nuovo Diablo, le meccaniche di Cat Quest sono semplici e intuitive, che si lasciano andare a un gameplay frenetico, ma mai troppo complesso. Il gioco non è molto lungo e in una decina di ore avrete visto tutto ciò che ha da offrire, ciononostante i Gentlebros hanno promesso alcuni update, quindi staremo a vedere.

Ovviamente è orientato a un pubblico giovane, ma un vecchierello come me con la passione dei gatti è riuscito ad apprezzarlo abbastanza.

Un plauso all'adattamento italiano, che si è impegnato a ricercare giochi di parole sulla falsariga di quelli inglesi. :)

34214987.review:
Cat Quest by developer The Gentlebros and publisher PQube Limited definitely doesn’t hem and haw. The introduction lasts about 30 seconds, and by the end of it you know the premise – you’re a cat knight who kills dragons. The action is fast-paced, the dialogue is snappy, and you bound across the landscape from town to town in just a matter of pawsteps. Think Skyrim if it were 80% simpler and, well, feline.

In fact, a lot of the mechanics of this game are much simpler versions of classic RPG adventure games like Skyrim. While there are weapons and armor to find, there’s no selling or bartering, and certainly no customization. Everything pretty much just upgrades as you do, and getting new toys is a game of luck. It has the classic setup – a main quest with side quests along the way – but each mini quest takes about a minute and a half to complete. You can learn magic to supplement your attacks, but there are only six spells available over the course of the whole game, and most of them do pretty much the same thing.

The simplified RPG experience has both positives and negatives. It’s terribly satisfying to plow through the main storyline, soaking up XP and gold left and right, especially when the fighting mechanics are easy to pick up. Learning the attack patterns of new monsters is intuitive yet challenging and a lack of complicated combos and attacks for your own character allows you to get into a good rhythm when you stand up to a swarm of bad guys. There’s something refreshing about stripping away the complicated upgrades, levels, bonuses, customizations, and gadgets of more convoluted RPG games.

But with simplicity you also lose a great deal of the newness that keeps these games interesting. Cat Quest is addictive and its shtick is clever and fun – up to a point. After a while, you’ve giggled over all of the cat puns, learned all of the spells, and seen the same side quest with only a small variation about 50 times, and things start to slow down. At a certain point the only way to progress in the game is killing the same monsters over and over in order to gain the XP necessary to complete the next quest. That can get tedious, especially when there isn’t a wide variety of interesting places to explore or people to meet (the townspeople, or towncats, are all a touch bland, and the caves are devastatingly similar). If the game were a little shorter, the simplicity might have been a better advantage.

Still, the mechanics are sharp and fun, and the storyline is humorously clever, so I’d give Cat Quest a 7 out of 10.

34212208.review:
喵喵喵！
非常经典的一款Q版RPG游戏！游戏不大，但却五脏俱全！
剧情：★★★★★【转折精彩的剧情！】
难度：★★★★★【这个游戏难度控制的太棒了！说高可高，说低可低！可以当高难度玩家的休闲游戏(●°u°●)  」，又可以满足休闲玩家(●°u°●)  」】
游戏性：★★★★☆【RPG该有的都有了！技能、装备、副本，而且并不是无脑刷刷刷，剧情和支线剧情都非常有意思！地图上还有各种彩蛋！不过职业与技能、打法都很依靠装备。】
画面：★★★★☆【这个价格的小游戏经典的Q版画风！】
音乐：★★★☆☆【音乐就是标准的小游戏音乐……不如自己开个……】
打斗：★★★☆☆【打斗手感还行，不过哪怕有六种魔法搭配用，但打斗方式依然算是单调。至少作为这个价位的小游戏来说已经很棒啦！】

毕竟是小游戏，怪物种类并不丰富，这一点是可以理解的。除了硬性方面的限制，其他许多细节都表现的很好，可以看出作者做非常用心，不会让你感到无聊，支线任务的剧情也很棒，画风也很轻松，对话也很搞笑。虽然是休闲轻松的类的游戏，但游戏的世界观和剧情却并不简单。
我一直以为主角是妹控！为了拯救妹妹才开始征程，可是，没想到……妹妹居然是假的(╯°Д°)╯︵┻━┻假的啊？！我是妹控呀？！你居然告诉我妹妹是假的
(╯°Д°)╯︵┻━┻︵┻━┻︵┻━┻︵┻━┻︵┻━┻︵┻━┻？！

……

玩家们在任务中应该会看到有金箱子，说是需要钥匙，这个钥匙是可以从地图的最南边，也就是最开始的地方继续往下面走，那里有一个小岛，岛上就有获取钥匙的任务。而需要过河的问题……多去跟那些哨塔下面的哨兵喵聊聊吧，他们知道许多小道消息，比如西面有人正在研究如何在海上行走和东北面有灌木丛知道如何飞行之类的小道传闻(●°u°●)  」


总而言之，是一款非常有意思，且五脏俱全的RPG小游戏(●°u°●)  」游戏流程大概一个下午就可以通关啦~☆

还有，有中文！绝赞啊！这中文翻译不是机翻！许多翻译都很地道呀！✧*｡٩(﻿●°u°●)و✧*｡

I highly recommend this game, as long as you aren't a completionist (although, I suppose in a few weeks enough information will be on the internet that you'll just be able to look it up).

The game is about a ten hour effort, but a very, very enjoyable ten hours. However, the achievement 'Fashionista Lion' is a huge time sink, and there's no good way to 'figure out' where to go or what to do. I spent several hours working on that with no progress before calling it quits. The devs don't appear to have programmed any intelligence into this effort, and just expected players to spend an asinine amount of time hugging walls. A completely un-fun addition to what is otherwise an extremely well done and enjoyable adventure.

34203692.review:
일단 스샷에서 알 수 있듯이 깜찍하고 귀여움.
전투도 단순하지만 나쁘지않음.
성장해가며 장비도 바꾸고 ((상점에서 사는 게 아니라 보물상자에서 얻는 방식인데 체인메일소드가 이미 있는데 또 체인메일소드를 얻으면 기존의 첸멜소드가 강화됌.))
퀘스트도 꺠고 마법도 배우는 흔한 RPG방식이라 뭐 어려운 것도 없어요.
퀘스트 받으면 화살표로 방향 다 알려주니 길도 헤메지 않음.

단점은,

1. 한글 지원이 안 됀다는 것. 영어, 독일어, 일본어 등등 몇개 있는데 한글만 없더라구요.
그래서 난 그나마 아는 영어 골랐는데  영어 까막눈이라 단어 몇개밖에 못 알아먹겠음.
게다가 영어가 뭔가 살짝 이상함. (perfect를 purfect로 쓴다던지) <- [영어권 특징이랍니다.]

2. 장비 판매가 안됌.  
옵션이 썩 좋지 않아 안 쓰게 돼는 장비(체력을 깎는 장비라던가.. 강화하면 체력을 더 깎음.)는 판매할 수 있었으면 좋겠음. 

---추가 사항---

게임 켜고 (패드 기준)A버튼 연타하면 타이틀화면과 플레이화면이 겹치는 버그 있음.
빨리 겜하고 싶은 건 알겠지만 연타하지 맙시다.

마나는 한정 되어있고, 마나포션도 없구만 어떻게 마법을 쓰라는 거지 생각했는데 
걍 지팡이도 몹 뚜까패면 마나가 참.

50원짜리 뽑기상자는 한 두번 사도 돼는데 5천원짜리 상자는 사지 마세요.
한번 해봤는데 보기에만 멋진 칼 나왔음요. 그 돈으로 차라리 마법 강화를.. 
5천원 아까워 죽겠음.

맵이 워낙 넓어서 걸어다니려면 한세월 걸림다.
근데 레벨30대 후반(보조퀘스트 안 깨고 다니면 더 빨리 할 수 있을 듯)
즈음에 날아다니는 스킬을 배우는데,
그럼 엄청 빨라져서 맵도 순식간에 왔다갔다 할 수 있어요.

던전안의 황금상자는 황금키가 있어야 열 수 있는데 황금키는 월드맵 7시방향쯤에 있는 섬안의 1레벨 던전안에서 얻을 수 있습니다. (그 전에 퀘스트 받아야 획득 가능.)

34200053.review:
Definitely enjoyed my playthrough of the game. 

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]

- Simple but constantly engaging
  - Never ever felt it was fustrating to have the need to have 'Fast Travel'
  - Combat was a good mix of simple controls and depth from different enemy types
  - Length of game and enenmy variety removed the sense of too much repetitive gameplay
- Gear leveling
  - A great way to introduction gear collection as you're constantly swapping gears till late game

[h1] Audio[/h1]

- Music
   - Blend between BGM was good whenever key points in a quest occurs (Mood change)
   - Wish there were more variety of BGM

- SFX
   - Satisfying hit feedback audio
   - Opening of chest felt very similar to opening gachas :D
   - different character actions conveyed specific audio

[h1]Visuals[/h1]
- Vibrant and cute
   - Certain characters (easter eggs) had their signature touches made to them
   - Different gear visuals were detailed and conveyed their specific stat types
   - Monsters could be identified easily

34192192.review:
1.游戏难度和操作手感:4/5

即时战斗
喵咪斗恶龙游戏采用完全即时的战斗系统，您可以靠近敌人后猛砍，
利用翻滚来躲避敌人回击，最后用强大的魔法消灭他们！ 使用呜呜闪电、咕噜之炎和治愈肉垫等古老魔法来消灭您的敌人！游戏难度和游戏难度偏低（没有难度设置），比较适合休闲玩家。使用手柄更好操作，而且动作劈砍和施法都是瞬发，没有延迟时间，对于追求爽快感的玩家还是不错的。

在勇者喵脚下有几个条：白色的是护甲条，能抵挡伤害，但是需要非战斗状态时缓慢恢复。红色的是血条，只能通过回城镇睡觉、升级、魔法恢复（吸血）回复。紫色的是能量条，通过武器攻击获得，有能量才能施法。
游戏也把战法两种武器的攻击方式同一化，区别只有伤害和外观模型，更降低了上手难度，你唯一要注意的就是躲避怪物攻击（魔法），怪物攻击或施法时地上会有时间圈，只要不是单手玩的基本都能避开。玩到50级后的任务或地区，因为怪物的血量大大提高，攻击方式也增加了，所以我只能用近战存能量然后放出魔法的hit&run，虽然有点刺激，但更多的是疲倦，扣1分。
2.剧情：4/5
主线任务是要救回主人公被反派抓走的喵妹妹，很简单的剧情。玩这个游戏因为难度设计原因，必须要通过支线剧情获取经验、金钱和装备，才能轻松过主线。丰富的支线剧情充实了这个游戏的世界，给我们描述了一个与龙抗争的喵喵世界。但是因为最后结局是有点黑童话的感觉，我个人来说很喜欢。
值得一说的是，有一个洞穴必须用雷电魔法清理。在大地图最西南方的小岛上，叫做PI废墟的。要用雷电清理小方块上面的怪物。其他魔法伤害不够或者距离不够。
总体评价是4分/5分，快餐游戏一个，但是很肝。原价入的话三思。

This game popped up in my Queue the other day and it immediately caught my attention. I love cats! I looked at the previews and jumped on this one. It's a fun, simple, dare I say ADORABLE, RPG that I find myself having to force myself to stop playing. The controls are easy to figure out once you've played for a good 10 minutes and from there it's pretty straightforward.

Now that's not to say the game lacks challenge. You will die. I've died quite a few times but thankfully you can save a lot and I recommend you save often! The side quests are everywhere and they are the quickest way to level up as you go. In fact, you will need to complete a few side quests just to progress through the some of the main quests.

This game for how simple it is, is a whole lot of fun. If you aren't hooked in the first hour you must not be a cat purr-son!

Вы кот. Кот с мечом.

На этом можно было и закончить, да только вы не обычный кот, избранный и с печальной историей. Вашу сестру похитил злодей и нам необходимо ее спасти, попутно выполняя незамысловатые побочные квесты и зачищая данжи.
Музыкальное сопровождение мне напомнило одну далекую игру еще с PSOne, Rhapsody: A Musical Adventure, ибо здесь оно такое же замечательное.
В Cat Quest множество данжей с сундукам, полно оружия, снаряжения и довольно приличный по масштабам открытый мир. А еще, тут есть магия.
Во время игры не покидало чувство, что она есть и на мобильных устройствах. Но нет, в Плей маркете ее нет, да и на планшете в нее играть совершенно невозможно, т.к управление завязано на WASD и стиках геймпада.
Cat Quest не очень сложная и скрасит вам пару вечеров, отдыхая после работы/учебы.
По скидке - брать, за полную стоимость подумайте, настолько вы любите котиков?

34176025.review:
I'm having a blast playing this. It's not hard, you don't need a spreadsheet to keep track of your stats, and it's fun to play, but also surprisingly deep. 

Basically, Cat Quest is a basic hack-and-slash RPG. Combat is real time. You hit with one button, and your defense is to dodge. But the most refreshing thing is that YOU ARE PLAYING AS A FUCKING CAT. 

There's a sizable map to explore, and the dialogue is witty enough to keep me grinning. 

A great way to chill.

34172864.review:
污染评测区(8.20更新)
[h1] 1.评价 [/h1]
战斗系统做的还算流畅，魔法都是即时效果，闪避延迟也不严重，作为ARPG还是可以的。剧情方面............有一种既视感，对于一个RPG来说不用太复杂。地图方面不行，首先是比较小，其次是二周目元素较少，最主要的是各种标志应该在大地图上明显的标出来。[spoiler] 我就为找一个任务盯半天的大地图，真以为是城镇找不同啊（跑） [/spoiler]音乐比较少，建议以后更新更多的bgm[strike] 方便出OST骗钱 [/strike]。其余方面一般。
总的来说是中等偏上的佳作，值得打折买
[h1] 2.部分战斗技巧 [/h1]
更新：适合部分手残？的打法
你们应该也看到了，我一直都是说闪避什么的sao操作，这可能对新人还有不熟悉ARPG的人比较难，所以写一点偏向正常人的打法
如果降低操作难度那么DPS就不能要求太高，所以就要硬吃不少魔法。
所以这么来看最应该升级的魔法是巨大术，其次是回血。至于装备则优先加攻，不要选防御，你不会有时间摆脱它们来回防的。
在打怪物的过程中难免躲闪不及。这时候首先，请务必躲开本体攻击，本体攻击伤害往往是最高的，一些高级怪物甚至会直接秒人。其次是冰冻魔法，后期如果吃一个冰冻debuff，那么基本就是半死了。最难躲的火属性AOE就硬吃吧，多砍几刀然后回血。另外就是尽量不要让魔力溢出，多回几口总是好的。

更新：200级洞穴和喵苏鲁
其实也没什么好写的，但这2个也算是游戏最终boss吧就写写[spoiler] 其实写评测之前就完成了，只是没想着加上而已 [/spoiler]
首先是200级洞穴，如果是只要装备那么先勾引一下，引到版底呸，地图下方再开冰冻，之后迅速向地图上部闪避闪到版顶，之后就开箱，最后引它回去就完了。如果想作死打一下那玩意，请务必带上你最好的魔法套装，并且把陷阱升到8级或以上，之后就是冰冻+陷阱慢慢磨，只不过场地很小，注意它的法术封位就行。
接下来是喵苏鲁，位置应该在钥匙岛的南边。攻击方式很简单，1.5秒1个陷阱+冰冻+本体攻击。而这个喵苏鲁血特别特别厚，陷阱伤害又高，很难去近身砍死，所以还是建议出陷阱+冰冻，不过这次可以带上防御套防陷阱。大致打法还是陷阱+冰冻，但不同的是要放很多的法术，所以要学会它的陷阱节奏，闪避砍一刀再跑，当成节奏游戏玩。另外这次因为是在外面，所以不用担心场地问题[spoiler] 我从地图右下角打到左下角然后又返回去才打完 [/spoiler]如果自己快被整死了，就慢慢的拖到别的地方，找个鱼补魔回血[spoiler] 怎么我变黄了 [/spoiler]。途中一定不要让它离开你的屏幕太长时间，否则它会重置，又要跑一遍。
最后，这2个boss打完后给的钱和经验非常少，所以不要想着刷钱或等级。

正篇
我是本来作为一个纯法师的，结果后面才发现必须打怪才能回魔，结果就变成战斗法师了............
先提醒一下，分为几个套路，加血，加攻，加防，加魔还有平均的。建议是选择加攻加魔混合的，这个游戏最强的就是战斗法师，其次是专加攻的战士或者忍者套，建议前期选这2种，不要选加血的装备。另外这个游戏的防御机制很有意思，防御是有CD的，而必须等不吸引怪后才能回复，所以如果要走防御流一定要学会放风筝。
所以说从这里开始就出现了玩家分歧：一类是什么不会只有拼命练级的菜鸟，一类是知道一些系统后各种娱乐作死的玩家（我这种），还有精通WOW，Dark Souls等RPG 完全高效率速杀的大佬。所以说如果技术相当强那么直接接主线就一路通关了............当然是不可能的，任务除建议等级外还有限制等级，不到一定等级任务就不会刷出来。所以某些大佬，不要满脑子想着sao操作，乖乖练级才是正路。[spoiler] 这个游戏如果有ARPG套路基础就会异常简单，建议先去看看某些视频学习一下 [/spoiler]
前期一定不要，不要买任何道具，全部从箱子里面找，实在钱多就去买5000的箱子，否则所有钱优先升级法术。务必学会火系，冰系，雷系魔法。如果不敢浪或者走防御流就优先升回血。其他可以学一下陷阱[spoiler] 娱乐用 [/spoiler]
如果是打算低等级挑战各种boss，建议优先升陷阱并且带最高法强套。升级冰魔法并不会延长冰冻debuff时长，所以1级冰魔法就够了，毕竟减速+陷阱才是最实用的。
关于各种怪物/boss：怪物种类不多，记住最佳消灭方式就行。一般我是闪避进场，放火系AOE，之后闪避放冰系[spoiler] 这游戏火和冰竟然不是相互克制，能叠烧伤和冰冻2层debuff [/spoiler]，然后摸2下闪避，放冰系，之后循环。学会节奏后就非常稳。[spoiler] 噫，怎么感觉自己比女武神驱动那里还恶心 [/spoiler]
最西边接任务学会水上行走后就去最南边接任务拿金钥匙，之后就能开金宝箱开高级装备。而到后期就是攒钱买箱子升级的阶段了。
关于所谓的最强装备龙魇？人家给你是让你去打boss的，然而这把武器的缺陷就是会扣100多血，一定要注意苟活。如果等级足够高钱足够多那后期的传奇装备足够吊打那破刀。
如果觉得无聊就去单挑各个支线没有的洞穴吧，一般能打高过5级的洞穴，熟练后就能穿着防御套各种花式飙车抢箱子[spoiler] 看见最中间那个200级的洞穴没，很简单的 [/spoiler]
大致就是这样了，仅代表个人意见。
[h1] 3.吐槽 [/h1]
以下剧透注意
这游戏写剧本的是和我有仇吗！做支线任务NPC所有亲属全是妹妹，结果到我这里发个幻象逗你玩，你让我这妹控怎么活啊！！！
这次没怎么刷怪，看到洞穴已通关就觉得有种罪恶感，undertale的后遗症？
最后是最重要的部分，请牢记
[u] 一日吸猫，终日想猫	[/u]
[u] 科学戒猫，从今开始	[/u]

如果都看到最后了，那顺手点个赞？

34171413.review:
Cat Quest is a colorful breath of fresh air in the RPG genre. It pays homage to other classic titles, especially Zelda, and is filled with paw-some references. It's also filled - FILLED! - with cat-puns. Some of them are quite bad, like "catfrontation" (Clawfrontation was the obvious choice).

The game is stunningly well-made, it is perhaps the cutest game out there, but in terms of art direction it's bright, colorful and uplifting, the animations and character designs are great as well. You control the protagonist, who has his sister kidnapped at the sea by a magical white cat. You are then accompanied by a Na'Vi-like guiding spirit that is as annoying as her who will help you on your quest to rescue your sister. 

Combat is in real-time, just like Zelda, in which you click to attack freely, and you must run around the map to dodge incoming attacks and spells. Some enemies can be quite challenging. While the game isn't linear, meaning you can go wherever you want to in any order you'd like to, areas are separated by level, which means you might need to get a few levels before advancing further. The world is pretty big and is filled with dozens of quests.

Overall, the game is really fun, it's super cute, very entertaining, but unfortunately too short. It can be completed in less than eight hours, which is feeble compared to the staple of the RPG genre. But in-game the developers have inserted many meta jokes, like the wolves of the Lupus Empire will only appear if Cat Quest becomes popular enough. My guessis this version of the game is testing the waters, because it growls for more content and it has the pawtential of being a good classic of the genre - if given enough attention.

You should definitely play this game if you love adventure, RPG and kittens.

เกมดีครับเข้าใจง่าย การเล่นก็เพลินดี ใช้เวลา 6-8 ชั่วโมงในการเล่นเคลียร์เนื้อเรื่องหลัก ต่อจากนั้นก็ค่อยเก็บเนื้อเรื่องเสริมต่อได้ครับ เกมไม่ยาก ไม่งมเพราะมีลูกศรชี้จุดที่เราจะต้องไปตลอดครับ ส่วนจะไปแล้วรอดหรือไม่รอดอันนี้อีกเรื่อง ถ้าสู้ไม่ไหวสามารถยกเลิกเควสได้ครับ(สำหรับเควสเนื้อเรื่องเสริม) ส่วนที่ใช้ปั๊มเงินกับเลเวล ให้เราเก่งพอสมควรแล้วไปตีดันเจี้ยนที่มีมังกรแดงคู่ครับน่าจะเร็วสุดแล้วมั้งในช่วงเลเวล 35-90 ระบบการต่อสู้นั้นเข้าไปตีมั่วๆไม่ไหวนะครับต้องตีแล้วฉากอยู่ตลอดไม่งั้นโดนสวนกลับ แล้วถ้าโดนรุมก็เสร็จเหมือนกัน สรุปเล่นเพลินดีครับ 10/10
ปล.ในเกมบอกว่าถ้าเกมนี้ดังพอสมควร (เขาคงวัดจากยอดซื้อ) แล้วจะมีเนื้อเรื่องที่ไปเกี่ยวกันกับน้องหมาด้วย ในเกมนี้ตัวละครที่ไม่รวมมอนสเตอร์นั้นเป็นแมวล้วน แต่มีตัวนึงที่เป็นหมาปลอมตัวเป็นแมวแล้วมาบอกเรื่องนี้นั่นแหละครับ ยังไงก็ช่วยกันอุดหนุนเกมด้วยครับ ^_^
